name: Kerser
description: '''Scott Froml''' (born 21 August 1987), better known by his [[stage name]] '''Kerser''',  is an Australian rapper. He has released two mixtapes and several albums since 2009 and his second album ''No Rest for the Sickest'' reached No. 15 on the [[ARIA Charts|ARIA albums chart]], while the album's tour DVD debuted at No. 1 on the ARIA Music DVD chart in 2013. His album ''[[S.C.O.T.]]'' reached No. 5 while his fourth album ''King'' was released on 13 November 2014 and reached number 9. Kerser achieved his first number one on the [[ARIA Albums Chart]] in 2023 with ''[[A Gift & a Kers]]''.
